title: Agree
lyrics:
Feels so good to fall in love
Why do I feel so far from where I started from?
Assisting him; the blood is thin
Sharing all the air I breathe; my secrets and my sins
Distant walls in his eyes and needs

Want to place you babe, tongue in teeth

Being good to you while losing me

Somehow I think we're friends; somehow I think we're free



But what is love anyway?

You don't believe in it—you agree with me

But what is love anyway?

You don't believe in love—you agree with me



Boiling plate to the Golden Gate

No drugs to blame—it was my fateful mistake

You reminded me who was actually worse

Some clichéd "Okay, let's not lose it in love."



But how do we stop what we started?

Well now it just hurts 'til we parted

But how do we stop what we started?

Well now it just hurts 'til we parted

But how do we stop what we started?

Well now it just hurts 'til we parted



But what is love anyway?

You don't believe in it—you agree with me

But what is love anyway?

You don't believe in love—you agree with me





In your arms though, you warm me with a smile

Leave me in the wood with the beauty for a while

When I've got out I've got a hundred people to tell

I want to be with you and blow it all to hell
